function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Poor quality and incomplete healthcare data impacting response to pandemic","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of historical data for new virus transmission, incubation period, and immunity duration.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to inadequate surveillance and control measures","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ambiguity and lack of understanding about the virus strain, behavior, and transmission","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global spread of infectious diseases through increased intercontinental air travels","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Highly contagious nature of covid-19","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of vaccine and medications against covid-19","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential risk of virus transmission through people-to-people contact in healthcare settings.","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Healthcare workers not using personal protective equipment ppe","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of coronavirus vaccine","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to preventive measures such as self-isolation and isolation of infected patients","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to follow who recommendations for avoiding close contact with infected individuals and animals","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of the virus through respiratory droplets released via coughs and sneezes.","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Longevity of the virus on different surfaces, increasing the risk of indirect transmission through touch.","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Asymptomatic spread of the virus before symptoms appear, leading to undetected transmission.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"No standard vaccine or cure for covid-19.","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete knowledge and uncertainties about the safety of air disinfection technologies","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient information on sars-cov-2 and viral transmissibility","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Far uv-c lamps can pose a risk to the cornea and skin","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited research on effectiveness of uv technologies against covid-19","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health risks associated with uvgi systems","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Airborne transmission of covid-19 is increased in indoor environments with relaxed restrictions","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of airborne disease transmission","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate air disinfection strategies leading to increased risk of airborne disease transmission","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education regarding the importance of ventilation and airflow control in disease transmission","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of hazard elimination measures for potential exposure to covid-19","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of administrative controls for covid-19","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air quality exacerbating the spread of airborne viruses","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large scientific literature on covid-19 and public health intervention.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective infection control and prevention measures","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research and and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases in shared office spaces and co-working environments.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reluctance to use elevators in high-rise buildings due to disease transmission concerns.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The potential for ongoing covid-19 pandemic","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential infection risks within
